GRADUATION POSTPONED TO JUNE 13

We’ve been monitoring the ongoing situation in Burbank, the Chicagoland area and across the nation. The safety of our students, families and staff is of the utmost importance. In consultation with the local police department, fire department, and city officials, the district has made the difficult decision to postpone this Saturday’s drive thru graduation and reschedule for Saturday, June 13. Our graduates deserve to be celebrated and we will make every effort to do so. The virtual graduation ceremony video will still be available as planned on Friday, June 5 at 7:00 pm. The link will be posted on the district website at www.bsd111.org. As always, we’ll continue to keep our families informed via the website, school messenger, and social media.
